Colombia (co)¶

Forms¶

Colombian-specific form helpers.

class localflavor.co.forms.CODepartmentSelect(attrs=None)[source]¶

A Select widget that uses a list of Colombian states as its choices.

Data¶

localflavor.co.co_departments.DEPARTMENT_CHOICES = ((u'AMA', u'Amazonas'), (u'ANT', u'Antioquia'), (u'ARA', u'Arauca'), (u'ATL', u'Atl\xe1ntico'), (u'DC', u'Bogot\xe1'), (u'BOL', u'Bol\xedvar'), (u'BOY', u'Boyac\xe1'), (u'CAL', u'Caldas'), (u'CAQ', u'Caquet\xe1'), (u'CAS', u'Casanare'), (u'CAU', u'Cauca'), (u'CES', u'Cesar'), (u'CHO', u'Choc\xf3'), (u'COR', u'C\xf3rdoba'), (u'CUN', u'Cundinamarca'), (u'GUA', u'Guain\xeda'), (u'GUV', u'Guaviare'), (u'HUI', u'Huila'), (u'LAG', u'La Guajira'), (u'MAG', u'Magdalena'), (u'MET', u'Meta'), (u'NAR', u'Nari\xf1o'), (u'NSA', u'Norte de Santander'), (u'PUT', u'Putumayo'), (u'QUI', u'Quind\xedo'), (u'RIS', u'Risaralda'), (u'SAP', u'San Andr\xe9s and Providencia'), (u'SAN', u'Santander'), (u'SUC', u'Sucre'), (u'TOL', u'Tolima'), (u'VAC', u'Valle del Cauca'), (u'VAU', u'Vaup\xe9s'), (u'VID', u'Vichada'))¶

A list of Colombian departaments as choices in a formfield.
